attributes.action: Close down the online petition system
attributes.additional_details: The current online petition system is a farce, suggestions have included breaking international law (arresting PM Netanyahu) and "Stop all benefits to illegal immigrants completely", something which the current government already does, the online petition system serves no real purpose in any sense as all petitioners can expect, even if they reach the arbitrary 100,000 figure is a generic response from a mid level civil servant, functioning waste funds that could be better employed elsewhere.
attributes.background: The online petition system is a waste of government money for little benefit to the tax payer.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106687

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
